name: In Zipper's house
description:
Raymond woke up in a scary place, haunted by a terrifying bunny... The door is locked, and the bunny is out for blood. Collect all 3 keys and escape before you get killed!

This is a First-person Animal Crossing-themed horror game. It is free to download, but will be available for download from this page only during Halloween.

Content warning:
The game features blood, dead villagers (Alfonso, Diva, Goldie), dead fishes, and scarejumps.

Credits:
Character models, objects models, "KK Parade" song: property of Nintendo.
KK Parade remix by Thomas.
Spooky Haunt font by Md Shohail Bhuian.

The game is no longer available for download from this page.
